text: Troitske (; ) is a village in Yasynuvata Raion (district) in Donetsk Oblast of eastern Ukraine, at 31.1 km NNE from the centre of Donetsk city. ==Demographics== In 2001 the settlement had 239 inhabitants. Native language as of the Ukrainian Census of 2001:Розподіл населення за рідною мовою на ukrcensus.gov.ua *Ukrainian — 87.03% *Russian 12.55% ==References== ==External links== * Weather forecast for Troitske Category:Villages in Donetsk Oblast
title: Troitske, Yasynuvata Raion
